interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  142  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " The Gem of the Emerald Isle " Seen " Back Out in the Heat " from Ami Arakawa
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first weekday on or after Day 142.

progression.synopsis: Most of the class suggestively ask Sensei how big the place they will be staying in for their beach trip is. He doesn't actually know, since he hasn't done anything more than talk with Ami about it, but Futaba knows, and Makoto is delegated to organise everything. Afterwards, Rin tells Sensei that she is "not great" at sleeping in new places, and asks him to look out for her if anything like last time happens.
trivia: If Detention happened, Sensei's comment about Chika will be different
Based on your progress with Chika, Sensei's conversation with Rin will change a little bit.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.7.

navigation.previous_event: The Gem of the Emerald Isle
